content: slip_stitch to chain 3 counts as skcl to extend length of top repeat the following two rounds until top is desired length round 33 chain 3 4cl counts as initial 5cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 three times v chain 1 treble_crochet three times chain 1 9cl repeat from * around ending 4cl in last 4 st slip_stitch to join round 34 slip_stitch to first chain space chain 3 and double_crochet in next 15 st *skcl double_crochet 15 repeat from * around to last 2 st double_crochet skip last st slip_stitch to chain 3 counts as skcl finishing attach yarn at neckline and work one or more rounds of single_crochet easing in neckline as desired end off weave in ends and block lightly hip shaping stitch diagram schematic copyright 2015 by rebecca averill revised january 2016 tales of the hook
